item.title: The Odyssey's Stunt Trainer Talks Matt Damon & Tom Holland’s Action Scenes, And He’s Very Impressed With Both Of Christopher Nolan’s Stars
item.description: Stunt performer James Newman discusses training Matt Damon and Tom Holland for Christopher Nolan’s The Odyssey, and he’s impressed with both stars.

item.title: Cardinals Picking The New Pope Are Watching Conclave To Prepare For Their Real-Life Conclave
item.description: Following the death of Pope Francis, real cardinals are watching Edward Berger’s Conclave in order to prepare for their selection of the new Pope.

item.title: Vincent D'Onofrio Addresses Kingpin Movie Appearance Hopes & Wilson Fisk's Complicated Rights Amid Spider-Man 4 Speculation
item.description: Daredevil: Born Again star Vincent D'Onofrio opens up about his hopes for Kingpin to appear in MCU movies as Spider-Man 4 speculations continue.
